name: Music Tiles 2 - Magic Piano
description:
No.1 Music game in 158 countries
100.000.000 players over around the world
Over 1000 piano songs

Game features:
• Bonus! Watch video to unlock songs
• Master's challenge kicks off! Reach the peak experience of speed challenge
• There are more albums and songs of various styles.
• You can add songs to your favorite
• Compete with global players

Game rules:
Tap on the black tiles while listening to music. Avoid the white ones. Enjoy classical and pop music, challenge your friends, improve your tapping speed
